title: SRCFG00011: Could not expand value platform.quarkus.native.builder-image in property quarkus.native.builder-image
body:
### Describe the bug

When I was building a quarkus multi-module project with gradle, the "./gradlew clean build" command kept getting an error :SRCFG00011: Could not expand value platform.quarkus.native.builder-image in property quarkus.native.builder-image. If this is a quarkus version problem, please tell me which version to use, and if this is a gradle version problem, please tell me which version to use. thank you.

### Expected behavior

build success

### Actual behavior

build fail

### How to Reproduce?

[Uploading quarkus-gradle-demo.zip…]()


./gradlew clean build

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

11

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.14.3

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

gradle

### Additional information

打包是uber-jar,不是native
